<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        /* 背景 and 布局 */
        
        section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 100vh;
            background-color: #121212;
        }
        /* 瓶子 */
        
        .bowl {
            position: relative;
            width: 300px;
            height: 300px;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .1);
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 8px solid transparent;
            animation: animate 5s linear infinite;
            transform-origin: bottom center;
        }
        
        @keyframes animate {
            0% {
                filter: hue-rotate(0deg);
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
            25% {
                transform: rotate(15deg);
            }
            50% {
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
            75% {
                transform: rotate(-15deg);
            }
            100% {
                filter: hue-rotate(360deg);
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
        }
        /* 瓶盖 */
        
        .bowl::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -15px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 40%;
            height: 30px;
            border: 15px solid #444;
            border-radius: 50%;
            box-shadow: 0 10px #222;
        }
        /* 瓶子高亮 */
        
        .bowl::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 40%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            border-radius: 50%;
            width: 150px;
            height: 80px;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .05);
        }
        
        .liquid {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 5px;
            right: 5px;
            bottom: 5px;
            background-color: #41c1fb;
            border-bottom-left-radius: 150px;
            border-bottom-right-radius: 150px;
            filter: drop-shadow(0 0 80px #41c1fb);
            animation: animate_liquid 5s linear infinite;
            transform-origin: top center;
        }
        
        @keyframes animate_liquid {
            0% {
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
            25% {
                transform: rotate(-20deg);
            }
            50% {
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
            75% {
                transform: rotate(-15deg);
            }
            100% {
                transform: rotate(20deg);
            }
        }
        
        .liquid::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
        }
        /* 瓶子高亮 */
        
        .shadow {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            /* 位于最底下 */
            top: calc(50% + 150px);
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            width: 300px;
            height: 30px;
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .5);
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
    </style>
    <title>liquid_ball</title>
</head>

<body>
    <section>
        <div class="shadow"></div>
        <div class="bowl">
            <div class="liquid"></div>
        </div>
    </section>
</body>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 100vh;
            background-color: #042104;
            animation: animateColor 8s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes animateColor {
            0% {
                filter: hue-rotate(0deg)
            }
            100% {
                filter: hue-rotate(360deg);
            }
        }
        
        .container {
            display: flex;
        }
        
        .circle {
            position: relative;
            width: 150px;
            height: 150px;
            margin: 0 -7.5px;
        }
        /* 为了让两个圆环联动,因为是,左边的转一圈,右边的转一圈,而且二者方向是相反的,让右边的旋转180度,他俩就正好拼接上了 */
        
        .circle:nth-child(2) {
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }
        /* 这个span只是用来规范小球的布局,内容写在span:before内 */
        
        span {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            /* 当父元素是position:relative;子元素是position:absolute;,子元素的transform默认相对于中点 */
            /* 20个球,正好是360度,两个球之间是18度 */
            transform: rotate(calc(18deg * var(--i)));
        }
        
        span::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: calc(50% - 7.5px);
            width: 15px;
            height: 15px;
            background-color: #00ff0a;
            border-radius: 50%;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px #00ff0a, 0 0 20px #00ff0a, 0 0 40px #00ff0a, 0 0 60px #00ff0a, 0 0 80px #00ff0a, 0 0 100px #00ff0a;
            /* 默认缩小为0.1 */
            transform: scale(0.1);
            animation: animate 4s linear infinite;
            /* 按照变量值,小球从0.1倍到1倍变化,执行的时间不同;变量值越大,执行时间越长,就达到了亮点转动的效果 */
            animation-delay: calc(0.1s * var(--i));
        }
        
        @keyframes animate {
            0% {
                transform: scale(1);
            }
            50%,
            100% {
                transform: scale(0.1);
            }
        }
        
        .circle:nth-child(2) span::before {
            animation-delay: calc(-0.1s * var(--i));
        }
    </style>
    <title>load_aerfa</title>
</head>

<body>
    <section>
        <div class="container">
            <div class="circle">
                <span style="--i:0"></span>
                <span style="--i:1"></span>
                <span style="--i:2"></span>
                <span style="--i:3"></span>

<!DOCTYPE html>

    <meta charset="UTF-8">

    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            font-family: 'Poppins' sans-serif;
        }
        
        body {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            min-height: 100vh;
            flex-direction: column;
            background-color: #0e1538;
        }
        
        a {
            position: relative;
            padding: 20px 60px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, .5);
            margin: 40px;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-decoration: none;
        }
        
        a:hover {
            background-color: var(--clr);
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--clr), 0 0 30px var(--clr), 0 0 60px var(--clr), 0 0 100px var(--clr);
        }
        
        a:hover::before {
            width: 120%;
        }
        
        a:hover::after {
            background-color: var(--clr);
        }
        /* 转动的长条 */
        
        a::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            width: 40px;
            height: 400px;
            background-color: var(--clr);
            transition: 1s;
            animation: animate 2s linear infinite;
            animation-delay: calc(0.33s *var(--i));
        }
        
        a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            /* inset是,填充父元素,并带有指定margin */
            inset: 4px;
            background-color: #0e1538;
        }
        
        @keyframes animate {
            0% {
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
            100% {
                transform: rotate(360deg);
            }
        }
        
        a span {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            font-size: 2em;
            color: #fff;
            opacity: .5;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 4px;
        }
        
        a:hover span {
            opacity: 1;
        }
    </style>
    <title>lightButton</title>
</head>
